title: Rxn order of X and Y from conc. vs time graph

content.question: The graph above shows the results of a study of the reaction of X with a large excess of Y to yield Z. The concentrations of X and Y were measured over a period of time. According to the results, which of the following can be concluded about the rate law for the reaction under the conditions studied?

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
